Text: Thank you very much for your review :)

Don't believe in that negative comment. The quality is really good most of the time and it's really enjoyable to watch! It goes black a couple of times, thats all but the sound is always clear and there's lots of really good close ups!
The quality is great. Only issue is how it goes black at times. Hopefully eventually some one will upload a copy of it that doesn't go black at important points in the story line.
This was a fantastic musical, and a really great recording of it. You won't find a better recording anywhere so just save yourself the trouble and get this one!
